original_title: 10年前にレイプした女の事が忘れられず、出所後、俺は再びあの女をレイプする事にした。
overview: Ten years ago, I was raped by a teacher. I still live with the trauma of that day. That moment still flashes back like it was yesterday... Ten years was too short for me. But...time won't wait. That man will be released today.
title: I Couldn’t Forget About the Woman I Raped 10 Years Ago, So After Getting Out of Prison, I Decided to Rape Her Again Luna Tsukino
